submitBackgroundCheckRequest

public java.lang.String submitBackgroundCheckRequest(java.lang.String firstName,
                                                     java.lang.String lastName,
                                                     java.lang.String dob,
                                                     java.lang.String ssn,
                                                     java.lang.String email,
                                                     java.lang.String callbackUrl,
                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionalParams)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
Submits a background check request.

Parameters:
firstName - the user's first name
lastName - the user's last name
dob - the user's dob (MMDDYYYY)
ssn - the user's ssn
email - the user's email
callback - to ping when the license request return
optional_params - a hash of additional parameters (defaults in parens):
  • fail_on_misdemeanor (true): check fails if a misdemeanor is found
  • fail_on_felony (true): check fails if a felony is found
  • fail_on_dui (true): check fails if a DUI or related offense is found
  • fail_on_sex_offense (true): check fails if a sex offense is found
  • fail_on_terrorist (true): check fails if the subject appears on the OFAC terrorist list
  • check_type (electronic): determines which type of check is run [electronic, recent, all]
Returns:
the requestId
Throws:
java.io.IOException

mailingAddressSendCode

public java.lang.String mailingAddressSendCode(java.lang.String firstName,
                                               java.lang.String lastName,
                                               java.lang.String address,
                                               java.lang.String city,
                                               java.lang.String state,
                                               java.lang.String zip,
                                               java.lang.String email,
                                               java.lang.String address2)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
Sends a postcard with a code to the specified mailing address

Parameters:
firstName - the user's first name
lastName - the user's last name
address - the user's address
city - the user's city
state - the user's state
zip - the user's zip
email - the user's email
address2 - the second line of the user's address (optional)
Returns:
requestId
Throws:
java.io.IOException

professionalLicenseSubmitRequest

public java.lang.String professionalLicenseSubmitRequest(java.lang.String firstName,
                                                         java.lang.String lastName,
                                                         java.lang.String state,
                                                         java.lang.String licenseType,
                                                         java.lang.String licenseNumber,
                                                         java.lang.String callbackUrl,
                                                         java.lang.String email)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
Submits a professional license request.

Parameters:
firstName - the user's first name
lastName - the user's last name
state - the user's state
licenseType - the user's license type
licenseNumber - the user's license number
callbackUrl - callback to ping when the license request return
email - the user's email
Returns:
requestId
Throws:
java.io.IOException
